event: Foundation of Asunción by Spanish conquistadors
Jesuit missions established among the Guaraní
Expulsion of Jesuits by Spanish crown
José Gaspar Rodríguez de Francia becomes dictator
Francia dies; Paraguay becomes more outward-looking
War of the Triple Alliance begins against Brazil, Argentina, and Uruguay
Paraguay defeated; loses large portion of population and territory
Peace treaties formalize Paraguay’s postwar borders
Chaco War with Bolivia begins over Gran Chaco region
Chaco War ends with Paraguayan victory
General Alfredo Stroessner seizes power in a coup
Fernando Lugo elected, ending decades of Colorado Party rule
Santiago Peña elected president, Colorado Party returns to power
